subject: p12410066
Findings: The patient is status post left pneumonectomy procedure with expected leftward shift of cardiomediastinal contours. Left chest tube has been removed. Pneumonectomy space remains predominantly air-filled with a small amount of fluid in the lower left hemithorax. Right lung is overexpanded and demonstrates linear atelectasis at the base. Subcutaneous emphysema in the left chest wall has slightly decreased from the prior study.
